001package arez;
002
003import arez.spy.ActionCompleteEvent;
004import arez.spy.ActionStartEvent;
005import arez.spy.ComponentCreateStartEvent;
006import arez.spy.ObservableValueCreateEvent;
007import arez.spy.ObserveScheduleEvent;
008import arez.spy.ObserverErrorEvent;
009import arez.spy.PropertyAccessor;
010import arez.spy.PropertyMutator;
011import arez.spy.Spy;
012import grim.annotations.OmitSymbol;
013import java.util.Collection;
014import java.util.Collections;
015import java.util.HashMap;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Map;
018import java.util.Objects;
019import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
020import javax.annotation.Nullable;
021import org.intellij.lang.annotations.MagicConstant;
022import static org.realityforge.braincheck.Guards.*;

024/**
025 * The ArezContext defines the top level container of interconnected observables and observers.
026 * The context also provides the mechanism for creating transactions to read and write state
027 * within the system.
028 */
029@SuppressWarnings( { "Duplicates" } )
030public final class ArezContext
031{
032  /**
033   * Id of next node to be created.
034   * This is only used if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns true but no name has been supplied.
035   */
036  private int _nextNodeId = 1;
037  /**
038   * Id of next transaction to be created.
039   *
040   * This needs to start at 1 as {@link ObservableValue#NOT_IN_CURRENT_TRACKING} is used
041   * to optimize dependency tracking in transactions.
042   */
043  private int _nextTransactionId = 1;
044  /**
045   * Zone associated with the context. This should be null unless {@link Arez#areZonesEnabled()} returns <code>true</code>.
046   */
047  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_zones" )
048  @Nullable
049  private final Zone _zone;
050  /**
051   * Tasks scheduled but yet to be run.
052   */
053  @Nonnull
054  private final TaskQueue _taskQueue = new TaskQueue( Task.Flags.PRIORITY_COUNT, 100 );
055  /**
056   * Executor responsible for executing tasks.
057   */
058  @Nonnull
059  private final RoundBasedTaskExecutor _executor = new RoundBasedTaskExecutor( _taskQueue, 100 );
060  /**
061   * Support infrastructure for propagating observer errors.
062   */
063  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_observer_error_handlers" )
064  @Nullable
065  private final ObserverErrorHandlerSupport _observerErrorHandlerSupport =
066    Arez.areObserverErrorHandlersEnabled() ? new ObserverErrorHandlerSupport() : null;
067  /**
068   * Support infrastructure for spy events.
069   */
070  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_spies" )
071  @Nullable
072  private final SpyImpl _spy = Arez.areSpiesEnabled() ? new SpyImpl( Arez.areZonesEnabled() ? this : null ) : null;
073  /**
074   * Support infrastructure for components.
075   */
076  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
077  @Nullable
078  private final Map<String, Map<Object, Component>> _components =
079    Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() ? new HashMap<>() : null;
080  /**
081   * Registry of top level observables.
082   * These are all the Observables instances not contained within a component.
083   */
084  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_registries" )
085  @Nullable
086  private final Map<String, ObservableValue<?>> _observableValues =
087    Arez.areRegistriesEnabled() ? new HashMap<>() : null;
088  /**
089   * Registry of top level computable values.
090   * These are all the ComputableValue instances not contained within a component.
091   */
092  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_registries" )
093  @Nullable
094  private final Map<String, ComputableValue<?>> _computableValues =
095    Arez.areRegistriesEnabled() ? new HashMap<>() : null;
096  /**
097   * Registry of all active tasks.
098   */
099  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_registries" )
100  @Nullable
101  private final Map<String, Task> _tasks = Arez.areRegistriesEnabled() ? new HashMap<>() : null;
102  /**
103   * Registry of top level observers.
104   * These are all the Observer instances not contained within a component.
105   */
106  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_registries" )
107  @Nullable
108  private final Map<String, Observer> _observers = Arez.areRegistriesEnabled() ? new HashMap<>() : null;
109  /**
110   * Locator used to resolve references.
111   */
112  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_references" )
113  @Nullable
114  private final AggregateLocator _locator = Arez.areReferencesEnabled() ? new AggregateLocator() : null;
115  /**
116   * Flag indicating whether the scheduler should run next time it is triggered.
117   * This should be active only when there is no uncommitted transaction for context.
118   */
119  private boolean _schedulerEnabled = true;
120  /**
121   * The number of un-released locks on the scheduler.
122   */
123  private int _schedulerLockCount;
124  /**
125   * Flag indicating whether the scheduler is currently active.
126   */
127  private boolean _schedulerActive;
128  /**
129   * Cached copy of action to execute tasks.
130   */
131  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_task_interceptor" )
132  @Nullable
133  private final SafeProcedure _taskExecuteAction = Arez.isTaskInterceptorEnabled() ? _executor::runTasks : null;
134  /**
135   * Interceptor that wraps all task executions.
136   */
137  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_task_interceptor" )
138  @Nullable
139  private TaskInterceptor _taskInterceptor;
140
141  /**
142   * Arez context should not be created directly but only accessed via Arez.
143   */
144  ArezContext( @Nullable final Zone zone )
145  {
146    _zone = Arez.areZonesEnabled() ? Objects.requireNonNull( zone ) : null;
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Return the map for components of specified type.
151   *
152   * @param type the component type.
153   * @return the map for components of specified type.
154   */
155  @Nonnull
156  private Map<Object, Component> getComponentByTypeMap( @Nonnull final String type )
157  {
158    assert null != _components;
159    return _components.computeIfAbsent( type, t -> new HashMap<>() );
160  }
161
162  /**
163   * Return true if the component identified by type and id has been defined in context.
164   *
165   * @param type the component type.
166   * @param id   the component id.
167   * @return true if component is defined in context.
168   */
169  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
170  public boolean isComponentPresent( @Nonnull final String type, @Nonnull final Object id )
171  {
172    apiInvariant( Arez::areNativeComponentsEnabled,
173                  () -> "Arez-0135: ArezContext.isComponentPresent() invoked when Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false." );
174    return getComponentByTypeMap( type ).containsKey( id );
175  }
176
177  /**
178   * Create a component with the specified parameters and return it.
179   * This method should only be invoked if {@link Arez#areNativeComponentsEnabled()} returns true.
180   * This method should not be invoked if {@link #isComponentPresent(String, Object)} returns true for
181   * the parameters. The caller should invoke {@link Component#complete()} on the returned component as
182   * soon as the component definition has completed.
183   *
184   * @param type the component type.
185   * @param id   the component id.
186   * @return true if component is defined in context.
187   */
188  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
189  @Nonnull
190  public Component component( @Nonnull final String type, @Nonnull final Object id )
191  {
192    return component( type, id, Arez.areNamesEnabled() ? type + "@" + id : null );
193  }
194
195  /**
196   * Create a component with the specified parameters and return it.
197   * This method should only be invoked if {@link Arez#areNativeComponentsEnabled()} returns true.
198   * This method should not be invoked if {@link #isComponentPresent(String, Object)} returns true for
199   * the parameters. The caller should invoke {@link Component#complete()} on the returned component as
200   * soon as the component definition has completed.
201   *
202   * @param type the component type.
203   * @param id   the component id.
204   * @param name the name of the component. Should be null if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns false.
205   * @return true if component is defined in context.
206   */
207  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
208  @Nonnull
209  public Component component( @Nonnull final String type, @Nonnull final Object id, @Nullable final String name )
210  {
211    return component( type, id, name, null );
212  }
213
214  /**
215   * Create a component with the specified parameters and return it.
216   * This method should only be invoked if {@link Arez#areNativeComponentsEnabled()} returns true.
217   * This method should not be invoked if {@link #isComponentPresent(String, Object)} returns true for
218   * the parameters. The caller should invoke {@link Component#complete()} on the returned component as
219   * soon as the component definition has completed.
220   *
221   * @param type       the component type.
222   * @param id         the component id.
223   * @param name       the name of the component. Should be null if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns false.
224   * @param preDispose the hook action called just before the Component is disposed. The hook method is called from within the dispose transaction.
225   * @return true if component is defined in context.
226   */
227  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
228  @Nonnull
229  public Component component( @Nonnull final String type,
230                              @Nonnull final Object id,
231                              @Nullable final String name,
232                              @Nullable final SafeProcedure preDispose )
233  {
234    return component( type, id, name, preDispose, null );
235  }
236
237  /**
238   * Create a component with the specified parameters and return it.
239   * This method should only be invoked if {@link Arez#areNativeComponentsEnabled()} returns true.
240   * This method should not be invoked if {@link #isComponentPresent(String, Object)} returns true for
241   * the parameters. The caller should invoke {@link Component#complete()} on the returned component as
242   * soon as the component definition has completed.
243   *
244   * @param type        the component type.
245   * @param id          the component id.
246   * @param name        the name of the component. Should be null if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns false.
247   * @param preDispose  the hook action called just before the Component is disposed. The hook method is called from within the dispose transaction.
248   * @param postDispose the hook action called just after the Component is disposed. The hook method is called from within the dispose transaction.
249   * @return true if component is defined in context.
250   */
251  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
252  @Nonnull
253  public Component component( @Nonnull final String type,
254                              @Nonnull final Object id,
255                              @Nullable final String name,
256                              @Nullable final SafeProcedure preDispose,
257                              @Nullable final SafeProcedure postDispose )
258  {
259    if ( Arez.shouldCheckApiInvariants() )
260    {
261      apiInvariant( Arez::areNativeComponentsEnabled,
262                    () -> "Arez-0008: ArezContext.component() invoked when Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false." );
263    }
264    final Map<Object, Component> map = getComponentByTypeMap( type );
265    if ( Arez.shouldCheckApiInvariants() )
266    {
267      apiInvariant( () -> !map.containsKey( id ),
268                    () -> "Arez-0009: ArezContext.component() invoked for type '" + type + "' and id '" +
269                          id + "' but a component already exists for specified type+id." );
270    }
271    final Component component =
272      new Component( Arez.areZonesEnabled() ? this : null, type, id, name, preDispose, postDispose );
273    map.put( id, component );
274    if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() )
275    {
276      getSpy().reportSpyEvent( new ComponentCreateStartEvent( getSpy().asComponentInfo( component ) ) );
277    }
278    return component;
279  }
280
281  /**
282   * Invoked by the component during it's dispose to release resources associated with the component.
283   *
284   * @param component the component.
285   */
286  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
287  void deregisterComponent( @Nonnull final Component component )
288  {
289    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
290    {
291      invariant( Arez::areNativeComponentsEnabled,
292                 () -> "Arez-0006: ArezContext.deregisterComponent() invoked when Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false." );
293    }
294    final String type = component.getType();
295    final Map<Object, Component> map = getComponentByTypeMap( type );
296    final Component removed = map.remove( component.getId() );
297    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
298    {
299      invariant( () -> component == removed,
300                 () -> "Arez-0007: ArezContext.deregisterComponent() invoked for '" + component + "' but was " +
301                       "unable to remove specified component from registry. Actual component removed: " + removed );
302    }
303    if ( map.isEmpty() )
304    {
305      assert _components != null;
306      _components.remove( type );
307    }
308  }
309
310  /**
311   * Return component with specified type and id if component exists.
312   *
313   * @param type the component type.
314   * @param id   the component id.
315   * @return the component or null.
316   */
317  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
318  @Nullable
319  Component findComponent( @Nonnull final String type, @Nonnull final Object id )
320  {
321    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
322    {
323      invariant( Arez::areNativeComponentsEnabled,
324                 () -> "Arez-0010: ArezContext.findComponent() invoked when Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false." );
325    }
326    assert null != _components;
327    final Map<Object, Component> map = _components.get( type );
328    if ( null != map )
329    {
330      return map.get( id );
331    }
332    else
333    {
334      return null;
335    }
336  }
337
338  /**
339   * Return all the components with specified type.
340   *
341   * @param type the component type.
342   * @return the components for type.
343   */
344  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
345  @Nonnull
346  Collection<Component> findAllComponentsByType( @Nonnull final String type )
347  {
348    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
349    {
350      invariant( Arez::areNativeComponentsEnabled,
351                 () -> "Arez-0011: ArezContext.findAllComponentsByType() invoked when Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false." );
352    }
353    assert null != _components;
354    final Map<Object, Component> map = _components.get( type );
355    if ( null != map )
356    {
357      return map.values();
358    }
359    else
360    {
361      return Collections.emptyList();
362    }
363  }
364
365  /**
366   * Return all the component types as a collection.
367   *
368   * @return the component types.
369   */
370  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_native_components" )
371  @Nonnull
372  Collection<String> findAllComponentTypes()
373  {
374    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
375    {
376      invariant( Arez::areNativeComponentsEnabled,
377                 () -> "Arez-0012: ArezContext.findAllComponentTypes() invoked when Arez.areNativeComponentsEnabled() returns false." );
378    }
379    assert null != _components;
380    return _components.keySet();
381  }

383  /**
384   * Create a ComputableValue with specified parameters.
385   *
386   * @param <T>      the type of the computable value.
387   * @param function the function that computes the value.
388   * @return the ComputableValue instance.
389   */
390  @Nonnull
391  public <T> ComputableValue<T> computable( @Nonnull final SafeFunction<T> function )
392  {
393    return computable( function, 0 );
394  }
395
396  /**
397   * Create a ComputableValue with specified parameters.
398   *
399   * @param <T>      the type of the computable value.
400   * @param function the function that computes the value.
401   * @param flags    the flags used to create the ComputableValue. The acceptable flags are defined in {@link ComputableValue.Flags}.
402   * @return the ComputableValue instance.
403   */
404  @Nonnull
405  public <T> ComputableValue<T> computable( @Nonnull final SafeFunction<T> function,
406                                            @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = ComputableValue.Flags.class ) final int flags )
407  {
408    return computable( null, function, flags );
409  }

418   */
419  @Nonnull
420  public <T> ComputableValue<T> computable( @Nullable final String name, @Nonnull final SafeFunction<T> function )
421  {
422    return computable( name, function, 0 );
423  }

478  /**
479   * Create a ComputableValue with specified parameters.
480   *
481   * @param <T>          the type of the computable value.
482   * @param component    the component that contains the ComputableValue if any. Must be null unless {@link Arez#areNativeComponentsEnabled()} returns true.
483   * @param name         the name of the ComputableValue.
484   * @param function     the function that computes the value.
485   * @param onActivate   the procedure to invoke when the ComputableValue changes from the INACTIVE state to any other state. This will be invoked when the transition occurs and will occur in the context of the transaction that made the change.
486   * @param onDeactivate the procedure to invoke when the ComputableValue changes to the INACTIVE state to any other state. This will be invoked when the transition occurs and will occur in the context of the transaction that made the change.
487   * @return the ComputableValue instance.
488   */
489  @Nonnull
490  public <T> ComputableValue<T> computable( @Nullable final Component component,
491                                            @Nullable final String name,
492                                            @Nonnull final SafeFunction<T> function,
493                                            @Nullable final Procedure onActivate,
494                                            @Nullable final Procedure onDeactivate )
495  {
496    return computable( component, name, function, onActivate, onDeactivate, 0 );
497  }

499  /**
500   * Create a ComputableValue with specified parameters.
501   *
502   * @param <T>          the type of the computable value.
503   * @param name         the name of the ComputableValue.
504   * @param function     the function that computes the value.
505   * @param onActivate   the procedure to invoke when the ComputableValue changes from the INACTIVE state to any other state. This will be invoked when the transition occurs and will occur in the context of the transaction that made the change.
506   * @param onDeactivate the procedure to invoke when the ComputableValue changes to the INACTIVE state to any other state. This will be invoked when the transition occurs and will occur in the context of the transaction that made the change.
507   * @return the ComputableValue instance.
508   */
509  @Nonnull
510  public <T> ComputableValue<T> computable( @Nullable final String name,
511                                            @Nonnull final SafeFunction<T> function,
512                                            @Nullable final Procedure onActivate,
513                                            @Nullable final Procedure onDeactivate )
514  {
515    return computable( name, function, onActivate, onDeactivate, 0 );

518  /**
519   * Create a ComputableValue with specified parameters.
520   *
521   * @param <T>          the type of the computable value.
522   * @param name         the name of the ComputableValue.
523   * @param function     the function that computes the value.
524   * @param onActivate   the procedure to invoke when the ComputableValue changes from the INACTIVE state to any other state. This will be invoked when the transition occurs and will occur in the context of the transaction that made the change.
525   * @param onDeactivate the procedure to invoke when the ComputableValue changes to the INACTIVE state to any other state. This will be invoked when the transition occurs and will occur in the context of the transaction that made the change.
526   * @param flags        the flags used to create the ComputableValue. The acceptable flags are defined in {@link ComputableValue.Flags}.
527   * @return the ComputableValue instance.
528   */
529  @Nonnull
530  public <T> ComputableValue<T> computable( @Nullable final String name,
531                                            @Nonnull final SafeFunction<T> function,
532                                            @Nullable final Procedure onActivate,
533                                            @Nullable final Procedure onDeactivate,
534                                            @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = ComputableValue.Flags.class ) final int flags )
535  {
536    return computable( null, name, function, onActivate, onDeactivate, flags );
537  }
538
539  /**
540   * Create a ComputableValue with specified parameters.
541   *
542   * @param <T>          the type of the computable value.
543   * @param component    the component that contains the ComputableValue if any. Must be null unless {@link Arez#areNativeComponentsEnabled()} returns true.
544   * @param name         the name of the ComputableValue.
545   * @param function     the function that computes the value.
546   * @param onActivate   the procedure to invoke when the ComputableValue changes from the INACTIVE state to any other state. This will be invoked when the transition occurs and will occur in the context of the transaction that made the change.
547   * @param onDeactivate the procedure to invoke when the ComputableValue changes to the INACTIVE state to any other state. This will be invoked when the transition occurs and will occur in the context of the transaction that made the change.
548   * @param flags        the flags used to create the ComputableValue. The acceptable flags are defined in {@link ComputableValue.Flags}.
549   * @return the ComputableValue instance.
550   */
551  @Nonnull
552  public <T> ComputableValue<T> computable( @Nullable final Component component,
553                                            @Nullable final String name,
554                                            @Nonnull final SafeFunction<T> function,
555                                            @Nullable final Procedure onActivate,
556                                            @Nullable final Procedure onDeactivate,
557                                            @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = ComputableValue.Flags.class ) final int flags )
558  {
559    return new ComputableValue<>( Arez.areZonesEnabled() ? this : null,
560                                  component,
561                                  generateName( "ComputableValue", name ),
562                                  function,
563                                  onActivate,
564                                  onDeactivate,
565                                  flags );
566  }
567
568  /**
569   * Build name for node.
570   * If {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns false then this method will return null, otherwise the specified
571   * name will be returned or a name synthesized from the prefix and a running number if no name is specified.
572   *
573   * @param prefix the prefix used if this method needs to generate name.
574   * @param name   the name specified by the user.
575   * @return the name.
576   */
577  @Nullable
578  String generateName( @Nonnull final String prefix, @Nullable final String name )
579  {
580    return Arez.areNamesEnabled() ?
581           null != name ? name : prefix + "@" + _nextNodeId++ :
582           null;
583  }
584
585  /**
586   * Create an "autorun" observer that reschedules observed procedure when dependency updates occur.
587   *
588   * @param observe the executable observed by the observer.
589   * @return the new Observer.
590   */
591  @Nonnull
592  public Observer observer( @Nonnull final Procedure observe )
593  {
594    return observer( observe, 0 );
595  }
596
597  /**
598   * Create an "autorun" observer that reschedules observed procedure when dependency updates occur.
599   *
600   * @param observe the executable observed by the observer.
601   * @param flags   the flags used to create the observer. The acceptable flags are defined in {@link Observer.Flags}.
602   * @return the new Observer.
603   */
604  @Nonnull
605  public Observer observer( @Nonnull final Procedure observe,
606                            @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = Observer.Flags.class ) final int flags )
607  {
608    return observer( (String) null, observe, flags );
609  }
610
611  /**
612   * Create an "autorun" observer that reschedules observed procedure when dependency updates occur.
613   *
614   * @param name    the name of the observer.
615   * @param observe the executable observed by the observer.
616   * @return the new Observer.
617   */
618  @Nonnull
619  public Observer observer( @Nullable final String name, @Nonnull final Procedure observe )
620  {
621    return observer( name, observe, 0 );
622  }
623
624  /**
625   * Create an "autorun" observer that reschedules observed procedure when dependency updates occur.
626   *
627   * @param name    the name of the observer.
628   * @param observe the executable observed by the observer.
629   * @param flags   the flags used to create the observer. The acceptable flags are defined in {@link Observer.Flags}.
630   * @return the new Observer.
631   */
632  @Nonnull
633  public Observer observer( @Nullable final String name,
634                            @Nonnull final Procedure observe,
635                            @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = Observer.Flags.class ) final int flags )
636  {
637    return observer( null, name, observe, flags );
638  }

642   *
643   * @param component the component containing the observer if any. Should be null if {@link Arez#areNativeComponentsEnabled()} returns false.
644   * @param name      the name of the observer.

648  @Nonnull
649  public Observer observer( @Nullable final Component component,
650                            @Nullable final String name,
651                            @Nonnull final Procedure observe )
652  {
653    return observer( component, name, observe, 0 );
654  }

682   * @return the new Observer.

686                            @Nullable final String name,

691  }

897  }

900   * Create an ObservableValue with the specified name.

903   * @param <T>  the type of observable.
904   * @return the new ObservableValue.
905   */
906  @Nonnull

908  {
909    return observable( name, null, null );
910  }

912  /**
913   * Create an ObservableValue.
914   *
915   * @param name     the name of the observable. Should be non null if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns true, null otherwise.
916   * @param accessor the accessor for observable. Should be null if {@link Arez#arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled()} returns false, may be non-null otherwise.
917   * @param mutator  the mutator for observable. Should be null if {@link Arez#arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled()} returns false, may be non-null otherwise.
918   * @param <T>      the type of observable.
919   * @return the new ObservableValue.
920   */
921  @Nonnull

923                                            @Nullable final PropertyAccessor<T> accessor,
924                                            @Nullable final PropertyMutator<T> mutator )
925  {
926    return observable( null, name, accessor, mutator );
927  }

934   * @param name      the name of the observable. Should be non null if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns true, null otherwise.

939                                            @Nullable final String name )

944  /**
945   * Create an ObservableValue.
946   *
947   * @param <T>       The type of the value that is observable.
948   * @param component the component containing observable if any. Should be null if {@link Arez#areNativeComponentsEnabled()} returns false.
949   * @param name      the name of the observable. Should be non null if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns true, null otherwise.
950   * @param accessor  the accessor for observable. Should be null if {@link Arez#arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled()} returns false, may be non-null otherwise.
951   * @return the new ObservableValue.
952   */
953  @Nonnull
954  public <T> ObservableValue<T> observable( @Nullable final Component component,
955                                            @Nullable final String name,
956                                            @Nullable final PropertyAccessor<T> accessor )
957  {
958    return observable( component, name, accessor, null );
959  }
960
961  /**
962   * Create an ObservableValue.
963   *
964   * @param <T>       The type of the value that is observable.
965   * @param component the component containing observable if any. Should be null if {@link Arez#areNativeComponentsEnabled()} returns false.
966   * @param name      the name of the observable. Should be non null if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns true, null otherwise.
967   * @param accessor  the accessor for observable. Should be null if {@link Arez#arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled()} returns false, may be non-null otherwise.
968   * @param mutator   the mutator for observable. Should be null if {@link Arez#arePropertyIntrospectorsEnabled()} returns false, may be non-null otherwise.
969   * @return the new ObservableValue.
970   */
971  @Nonnull
972  public <T> ObservableValue<T> observable( @Nullable final Component component,
973                                            @Nullable final String name,
974                                            @Nullable final PropertyAccessor<T> accessor,
975                                            @Nullable final PropertyMutator<T> mutator )
976  {
977    final ObservableValue<T> observableValue =
978      new ObservableValue<>( Arez.areZonesEnabled() ? this : null,
979                             component,
980                             generateName( "ObservableValue", name ),
981                             null,
982                             accessor,
983                             mutator );
984    if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() )
985    {
986      getSpy().reportSpyEvent( new ObservableValueCreateEvent( observableValue.asInfo() ) );
987    }
988    return observableValue;
989  }
990
991  /**
992   * Pass the supplied observer to the scheduler.
993   * The observer should NOT be already pending execution.
994   *
995   * @param observer the reaction to schedule.
996   */
997  void scheduleReaction( @Nonnull final Observer observer )
998  {
999    if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() )
1000    {
1001      getSpy().reportSpyEvent( new ObserveScheduleEvent( observer.asInfo() ) );
1002    }
1003    if ( Arez.shouldEnforceTransactionType() && isTransactionActive() && Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
1004    {
1005      invariant( () -> getTransaction().isMutation() || getTransaction().isComputableValueTracker(),
1006                 () -> "Arez-0013: Observer named '" + observer.getName() + "' attempted to be scheduled during " +
1007                       "read-only transaction." );
1008      invariant( () -> getTransaction().getTracker() != observer ||
1009                       getTransaction().isMutation(),
1010                 () -> "Arez-0014: Observer named '" + observer.getName() + "' attempted to schedule itself during " +
1011                       "read-only tracking transaction. Observers that are supporting ComputableValue instances " +
1012                       "must not schedule self." );
1013    }
1014    _taskQueue.queueTask( observer.getTask() );
1015  }
1016
1017  /**
1018   * Create and queue a task to be executed by the runtime.
1019   * If the scheduler is not running then the scheduler will be triggered.
1020   *
1021   * @param work the representation of the task to execute.
1022   * @return the new task.
1023   */
1024  @Nonnull
1025  public Task task( @Nonnull final SafeProcedure work )
1026  {
1027    return task( null, work );
1028  }
1029
1030  /**
1031   * Create and queue a task to be executed by the runtime.
1032   * If the scheduler is not running then the scheduler will be triggered.
1033   *
1034   * @param name the name of the task. Must be null if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns <code>false</code>.
1035   * @param work the representation of the task to execute.
1036   * @return the new task.
1037   */
1038  @Nonnull
1039  public Task task( @Nullable final String name, @Nonnull final SafeProcedure work )
1040  {
1041    return task( name, work, 0 );
1042  }
1043
1044  /**
1045   * Create and queue a task to be executed by the runtime.
1046   * If the scheduler is not running and the {@link Task.Flags#RUN_LATER} flag has not been supplied then the
1047   * scheduler will be triggered.
1048   *
1049   * @param work  the representation of the task to execute.
1050   * @param flags the flags to configure task. Valid flags include PRIORITY_* flags, DISPOSE_ON_COMPLETE and RUN_* flags.
1051   * @return the new task.
1052   */
1053  @Nonnull
1054  public Task task( @Nonnull final SafeProcedure work,
1055                    @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = Task.Flags.class ) final int flags )
1056  {
1057    return task( null, work, flags );
1058  }
1059
1060  /**
1061   * Create and queue a task to be executed by the runtime.
1062   * If the scheduler is not running and the {@link Task.Flags#RUN_LATER} flag has not been supplied then the
1063   * scheduler will be triggered.
1064   *
1065   * @param name  the name of the task. Must be null if {@link Arez#areNamesEnabled()} returns <code>false</code>.
1066   * @param work  the representation of the task to execute.
1067   * @param flags the flags to configure task. Valid flags include PRIORITY_* flags, DISPOSE_ON_COMPLETE and RUN_* flags.
1068   * @return the new task.
1069   */
1070  @Nonnull
1071  public Task task( @Nullable final String name,
1072                    @Nonnull final SafeProcedure work,
1073                    @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = Task.Flags.class ) final int flags )
1074  {
1075    final Task task = new Task( Arez.areZonesEnabled() ? this : null, generateName( "Task", name ), work, flags );
1076    task.initialSchedule();
1077    return task;
1078  }
1079
1080  /**
1081   * Return true if the scheduler is currently executing tasks.
1082   *
1083   * @return true if the scheduler is currently executing tasks.
1084   */
1085  public boolean isSchedulerActive()
1086  {
1087    return _schedulerActive;
1088  }
1089
1090  /**
1091   * Return true if there is a transaction in progress.
1092   *
1093   * @return true if there is a transaction in progress.
1094   */
1095  public boolean isTransactionActive()
1096  {
1097    return Transaction.isTransactionActive( this );
1098  }
1099
1100  /**
1101   * Return true if there is a tracking transaction in progress.
1102   * A tracking transaction is one created by an {@link Observer} via the {@link #observer(Procedure)}
1103   * or {@link #tracker(Procedure)} methods.
1104   *
1105   * @return true if there is a tracking transaction in progress.
1106   */
1107  public boolean isTrackingTransactionActive()
1108  {
1109    return Transaction.isTransactionActive( this ) && null != Transaction.current().getTracker();
1110  }
1111
1112  /**
1113   * Return true if there is a read-write transaction in progress.
1114   *
1115   * @return true if there is a read-write transaction in progress.
1116   */
1117  public boolean isReadWriteTransactionActive()
1118  {
1119    return Transaction.isTransactionActive( this ) &&
1120           ( !Arez.shouldEnforceTransactionType() || Transaction.current().isMutation() );
1121  }
1122
1123  /**
1124   * Return true if there is a read-only transaction in progress.
1125   *
1126   * @return true if there is a read-only transaction in progress.
1127   */
1128  public boolean isReadOnlyTransactionActive()
1129  {
1130    return Transaction.isTransactionActive( this ) &&
1131           ( !Arez.shouldEnforceTransactionType() || !Transaction.current().isMutation() );
1132  }
1133
1134  /**
1135   * Return the current transaction.
1136   * This method should not be invoked unless a transaction active and will throw an
1137   * exception if invariant checks are enabled.
1138   *
1139   * @return the current transaction.
1140   */
1141  @Nonnull
1142  Transaction getTransaction()
1143  {
1144    final Transaction current = Transaction.current();
1145    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
1146    {
1147      invariant( () -> !Arez.areZonesEnabled() || current.getContext() == this,
1148                 () -> "Arez-0015: Attempting to get current transaction but current transaction is for different context." );
1149    }
1150    return current;
1151  }
1152
1153  /**
1154   * Enable scheduler so that it will run pending observers next time it is triggered.
1155   */
1156  void enableScheduler()
1157  {
1158    _schedulerEnabled = true;
1159  }
1160
1161  /**
1162   * Disable scheduler so that it will not run pending observers next time it is triggered.
1163   */
1164  void disableScheduler()
1165  {
1166    _schedulerEnabled = false;
1167  }
1168
1169  /**
1170   * Return true if the scheduler enabled flag is true.
1171   * It is still possible that the scheduler has un-released locks so this
1172   * does not necessarily imply that the schedule will run.
1173   *
1174   * @return true if the scheduler enabled flag is true.
1175   */
1176  boolean isSchedulerEnabled()
1177  {
1178    return _schedulerEnabled;
1179  }
1180
1181  /**
1182   * Release a scheduler lock to enable scheduler to run again.
1183   * Trigger reactions if lock reaches 0 and no current transaction.
1184   */
1185  void releaseSchedulerLock()
1186  {
1187    _schedulerLockCount--;
1188    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
1189    {
1190      invariant( () -> _schedulerLockCount >= 0,
1191                 () -> "Arez-0016: releaseSchedulerLock() reduced schedulerLockCount below 0." );
1192    }
1193    triggerScheduler();
1194  }
1195
1196  /**
1197   * Return true if the scheduler is paused.
1198   * True means that {@link #pauseScheduler()} has been called one or more times and the lock not disposed.
1199   *
1200   * @return true if the scheduler is paused, false otherwise.
1201   */
1202  public boolean isSchedulerPaused()
1203  {
1204    return _schedulerLockCount != 0;
1205  }
1206
1207  /**
1208   * Pause scheduler so that it will not run any reactions next time {@link #triggerScheduler()} is invoked.
1209   * The scheduler will not resume scheduling reactions until the lock returned from this method is disposed.
1210   *
1211   * <p>The intention of this method is to allow the user to manually batch multiple actions, before
1212   * disposing the lock and allowing reactions to flow through the system. A typical use-case is when
1213   * a large network packet is received and processed over multiple ticks but you only want the
1214   * application to react once.</p>
1215   *
1216   * <p>If this is invoked from within a reaction then the current behaviour will continue to process any
1217   * pending reactions until there is none left. However this behaviour should not be relied upon as it may
1218   * result in an abort in the future.</p>
1219   *
1220   * <p>It should be noted that this is the one way where inconsistent state can creep into an Arez application.
1221   * If an external action can trigger while the scheduler is paused. i.e. In the browser when an
1222   * event-handler calls back from UI when the reactions have not run. Thus the event handler could be
1223   * based on stale data. If this can occur the developer should </p>
1224   *
1225   * @return a lock on scheduler.
1226   */
1227  @Nonnull
1228  public SchedulerLock pauseScheduler()
1229  {
1230    _schedulerLockCount++;
1231    return new SchedulerLock( Arez.areZonesEnabled() ? this : null );
1232  }
1233
1234  /**
1235   * Specify a interceptor to use to wrap task execution in.
1236   *
1237   * @param taskInterceptor interceptor used to wrap task execution.
1238   */
1239  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_task_interceptor" )
1240  public void setTaskInterceptor( @Nullable final TaskInterceptor taskInterceptor )
1241  {
1242    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
1243    {
1244      invariant( Arez::isTaskInterceptorEnabled,
1245                 () -> "Arez-0039: setTaskInterceptor() invoked but Arez.isTaskInterceptorEnabled() returns false." );
1246    }
1247    _taskInterceptor = taskInterceptor;
1248  }
1249
1250  /**
1251   * Method invoked to trigger the scheduler to run any pending reactions. The scheduler will only be
1252   * triggered if there is no transaction active. This method is typically used after one or more Observers
1253   * have been created outside a transaction with the runImmediately flag set to false and the caller wants
1254   * to force the observers to react. Otherwise the Observers will not be schedule until the next top-level
1255   * transaction completes.
1256   */
1257  public void triggerScheduler()
1258  {
1259    if ( isSchedulerEnabled() && !isSchedulerPaused() )
1260    {
1261      // Each reaction creates a top level transaction that attempts to run call
1262      // this method when it completes. Rather than allow this if it is detected
1263      // that we are running reactions already then just abort and assume the top
1264      // most invocation of runPendingTasks will handle scheduling
1265      if ( !_schedulerActive )
1266      {
1267        _schedulerActive = true;
1268        try
1269        {
1270          if ( Arez.isTaskInterceptorEnabled() && null != _taskInterceptor )
1271          {
1272            assert null != _taskExecuteAction;
1273            do
1274            {
1275              _taskInterceptor.executeTasks( _taskExecuteAction );
1276            } while ( _executor.getPendingTaskCount() > 0 );
1277          }
1278          else
1279          {
1280            _executor.runTasks();
1281          }
1282        }
1283        finally
1284        {
1285          _schedulerActive = false;
1286        }
1287      }
1288    }
1289  }
1290

1299   */
1300  public <T> T action( @Nonnull final Function<T> executable )
1301    throws Throwable

1681  <T> T rawCompute( @Nonnull final ComputableValue<T> computableValue, @Nonnull final SafeFunction<T> action )

1684                        action,
1685                        ActionFlags.REQUIRE_NEW_TRANSACTION |
1686                        ActionFlags.NO_VERIFY_ACTION_REQUIRED |
1687                        ActionFlags.READ_ONLY,
1688                        null,
1689                        null,
1690                        false,
1691                        false );
1692  }

1694  /**
1695   * Convert the specified procedure to a function.
1696   * This is done purely to reduce the compiled code-size under js.
1697   *
1698   * @param procedure the procedure.
1699   * @return the function.
1700   */
1701  @Nonnull
1702  private SafeFunction<Object> safeProcedureToFunction( @Nonnull final SafeProcedure procedure )
1703  {
1704    return () -> {
1705      procedure.call();
1706      return null;
1707    };
1708  }

1718  private Function<Object> procedureToFunction( @Nonnull final Procedure procedure )

1721      procedure.call();
1722      return null;
1723    };

1818                    () -> "Arez-0020: Attempted to invoke safeObserve(..) on observer named '" + observer.getName() +
1819                          "' but observer is not configured to use an application executor." );
1820    }

1829
1830  private <T> T _safeAction( @Nullable final String specifiedName,
1831                             @Nonnull final SafeFunction<T> executable,
1832                             final int flags,
1833                             @Nullable final Observer observer,
1834                             @Nullable final Object[] parameters,
1835                             final boolean expectResult,
1836                             final boolean generateActionEvents )
1837  {
1838    final String name = generateName( "Action", specifiedName );
1839
1840    verifyActionFlags( name, flags );
1841
1842    final boolean observe = null != observer;
1843    Throwable t = null;
1844    boolean completed = false;
1845    long startedAt = 0L;
1846    T result;
1847    try
1848    {
1849      if ( Arez.areSpiesEnabled() && generateActionEvents )
1850      {
1851        startedAt = System.currentTimeMillis();
1852        if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() )
1853        {
1854          reportActionStarted( name, parameters, observe );
1855        }
1856      }
1857      verifyActionNestingAllowed( name, observer );
1858      if ( canImmediatelyInvokeAction( flags ) )
1859      {
1860        result = executable.call();
1861      }
1862      else
1863      {
1864        final Transaction transaction = newTransaction( name, flags, observer );
1865        try
1866        {
1867          result = executable.call();
1868          verifyActionDependencies( name, observer, flags, transaction );
1869        }
1870        finally
1871        {
1872          Transaction.commit( transaction );
1873        }
1874      }
1875      if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() && generateActionEvents )
1876      {
1877        completed = true;
1878        final boolean noReportResults = ( flags & ActionFlags.NO_REPORT_RESULT ) == ActionFlags.NO_REPORT_RESULT;
1879        reportActionCompleted( name,
1880                               parameters,
1881                               observe,
1882                               null,
1883                               startedAt,
1884                               expectResult,
1885                               noReportResults ? null : result );
1886      }
1887      return result;
1888    }
1889    catch ( final Throwable e )
1890    {
1891      t = e;
1892      throw e;
1893    }
1894    finally
1895    {
1896      if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() && generateActionEvents )
1897      {
1898        if ( !completed )
1899        {
1900          reportActionCompleted( name, parameters, observe, t, startedAt, expectResult, null );
1901        }
1902      }
1903      triggerScheduler();
1904    }
1905  }
1906
1907  private <T> T _action( @Nullable final String specifiedName,
1908                         @Nonnull final Function<T> executable,
1909                         final int flags,
1910                         @Nullable final Observer observer,
1911                         @Nullable final Object[] parameters,
1912                         final boolean expectResult )
1913    throws Throwable
1914  {
1915    final String name = generateName( "Action", specifiedName );
1916
1917    verifyActionFlags( name, flags );
1918    final boolean observed = null != observer;
1919    final boolean generateActionEvents = !observed || !observer.isComputableValue();
1920    Throwable t = null;
1921    boolean completed = false;
1922    long startedAt = 0L;
1923    T result;
1924    try
1925    {
1926      if ( Arez.areSpiesEnabled() && generateActionEvents )
1927      {
1928        startedAt = System.currentTimeMillis();
1929        if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() )
1930        {
1931          reportActionStarted( name, parameters, observed );
1932        }
1933      }
1934      verifyActionNestingAllowed( name, observer );
1935      if ( canImmediatelyInvokeAction( flags ) )
1936      {
1937        result = executable.call();
1938      }
1939      else
1940      {
1941        final Transaction transaction = newTransaction( name, flags, observer );
1942        try
1943        {
1944          result = executable.call();
1945          verifyActionDependencies( name, observer, flags, transaction );
1946        }
1947        finally
1948        {
1949          Transaction.commit( transaction );
1950        }
1951      }
1952      if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() && generateActionEvents )
1953      {
1954        completed = true;
1955        final boolean noReportResults = ( flags & ActionFlags.NO_REPORT_RESULT ) == ActionFlags.NO_REPORT_RESULT;
1956        reportActionCompleted( name,
1957                               parameters,
1958                               observed,
1959                               null,
1960                               startedAt,
1961                               expectResult,
1962                               noReportResults ? null : result );
1963      }
1964      return result;
1965    }
1966    catch ( final Throwable e )
1967    {
1968      t = e;
1969      throw e;
1970    }
1971    finally
1972    {
1973      if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() && generateActionEvents )
1974      {
1975        if ( !completed )
1976        {
1977          reportActionCompleted( name, parameters, observed, t, startedAt, expectResult, null );
1978        }
1979      }
1980      triggerScheduler();
1981    }
1982  }
1983
1984  private void verifyActionFlags( @Nullable final String name,
1985                                  @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = ActionFlags.class ) final int flags )
1986  {
1987    if ( Arez.shouldCheckApiInvariants() )
1988    {
1989      final int nonActionFlags = flags & ~ActionFlags.CONFIG_FLAGS_MASK;
1990      apiInvariant( () -> 0 == nonActionFlags,
1991                    () -> "Arez-0212: Flags passed to action '" + name + "' include some unexpected " +
1992                          "flags set: " + nonActionFlags );
1993      apiInvariant( () -> !Arez.shouldEnforceTransactionType() ||
1994                          Transaction.Flags.isTransactionModeValid( Transaction.Flags.transactionMode( flags ) |
1995                                                                    flags ),
1996                    () -> "Arez-0126: Flags passed to action '" + name + "' include both READ_ONLY and READ_WRITE." );
1997      apiInvariant( () -> ActionFlags.isVerifyActionRuleValid( flags | ActionFlags.verifyActionRule( flags ) ),
1998                    () -> "Arez-0127: Flags passed to action '" + name + "' include both VERIFY_ACTION_REQUIRED " +
1999                          "and NO_VERIFY_ACTION_REQUIRED." );
2000    }
2001  }
2002
2003  private void verifyActionDependencies( @Nullable final String name,
2004                                         @Nullable final Observer observer,
2005                                         final int flags,
2006                                         @Nonnull final Transaction transaction )
2007  {
2008    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
2009    {
2010      if ( null == observer )
2011      {
2012        verifyActionRequired( transaction, flags );
2013      }
2014      else if ( Observer.Flags.AREZ_DEPENDENCIES == ( flags & Observer.Flags.AREZ_DEPENDENCIES ) )
2015      {
2016        final Transaction current = Transaction.current();
2017
2018        final List<ObservableValue<?>> observableValues = current.getObservableValues();
2019        invariant( () -> Objects.requireNonNull( current.getTracker() ).isDisposing() ||
2020                         ( null != observableValues && !observableValues.isEmpty() ),
2021                   () -> "Arez-0118: Observer named '" + name + "' completed observed function (executed by " +
2022                         "application) but is not observing any properties." );
2023      }
2024    }
2025  }
2026
2027  private void verifyActionRequired( @Nonnull final Transaction transaction,
2028                                     @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = ActionFlags.class ) final int flags )
2029  {
2030    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() &&
2031         ActionFlags.NO_VERIFY_ACTION_REQUIRED != ( flags & ActionFlags.NO_VERIFY_ACTION_REQUIRED ) )
2032    {
2033      invariant( transaction::hasTransactionUseOccured,
2034                 () -> "Arez-0185: Action named '" + transaction.getName() + "' completed but no reads, writes, " +
2035                       "schedules, reportStales or reportPossiblyChanged occurred within the scope of the action." );
2036    }
2037  }
2038
2039  @Nonnull
2040  private Transaction newTransaction( @Nullable final String name,
2041                                      @MagicConstant( flagsFromClass = ActionFlags.class ) final int flags,
2042                                      @Nullable final Observer observer )
2043  {
2044    final boolean mutation = Arez.shouldEnforceTransactionType() && 0 == ( flags & Transaction.Flags.READ_ONLY );
2045    return Transaction.begin( this, generateName( "Transaction", name ), mutation, observer );
2046  }
2047
2048  /**
2049   * Return true if action can immediately invoked, false if a transaction needs to be created.
2050   */
2051  private boolean canImmediatelyInvokeAction( final int flags )
2052  {
2053    return 0 == ( flags & ActionFlags.REQUIRE_NEW_TRANSACTION ) &&
2054           ( Arez.shouldEnforceTransactionType() &&
2055             ( ActionFlags.READ_ONLY == ( flags & ActionFlags.READ_ONLY ) ) ?
2056             isReadOnlyTransactionActive() :
2057             isReadWriteTransactionActive() );
2058  }
2059
2060  private void verifyActionNestingAllowed( @Nullable final String name, @Nullable final Observer observer )
2061  {
2062    if ( Arez.shouldEnforceTransactionType() )
2063    {
2064      final Transaction parentTransaction = Transaction.isTransactionActive( this ) ? Transaction.current() : null;
2065      if ( null != parentTransaction )
2066      {
2067        final Observer parent = parentTransaction.getTracker();
2068        apiInvariant( () -> null == parent ||
2069                            parent.nestedActionsAllowed() ||
2070                            ( null != observer && observer.isComputableValue() ),
2071                      () -> "Arez-0187: Attempting to nest action named '" + name + "' " +
2072                            "inside transaction named '" + parentTransaction.getName() + "' created by an " +
2073                            "observer that does not allow nested actions." );
2074      }
2075    }
2076  }
2077
2078  /**
2079   * Return next transaction id and increment internal counter.
2080   * The id is a monotonically increasing number starting at 1.
2081   *
2082   * @return the next transaction id.
2083   */
2084  int nextTransactionId()
2085  {
2086    return _nextTransactionId++;
2087  }

2091   * The Locator must not already be registered.
2092   * This should not be invoked unless Arez.areReferencesEnabled() returns true.
2093   *
2094   * @param locator the Locator to register.
2095   * @return the disposable to dispose to deregister locator.
2096   */
2097  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_references" )
2098  @Nonnull
2099  public Disposable registerLocator( @Nonnull final Locator locator )
2100  {
2101    if ( Arez.shouldCheckApiInvariants() )
2102    {
2103      apiInvariant( Arez::areReferencesEnabled,
2104                    () -> "Arez-0191: ArezContext.registerLocator invoked but Arez.areReferencesEnabled() returned false." );
2105    }
2106    assert null != _locator;
2107    return _locator.registerLocator( Objects.requireNonNull( locator ) );
2108  }

2129  /**
2130   * Add error handler to the list of error handlers called.
2131   * The handler should not already be in the list. This method should NOT be called if
2132   * {@link Arez#areObserverErrorHandlersEnabled()} returns false.
2133   *
2134   * @param handler the error handler.
2135   */
2136  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_observer_error_handlers" )
2137  public void addObserverErrorHandler( @Nonnull final ObserverErrorHandler handler )
2138  {
2139    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
2140    {
2141      invariant( Arez::areObserverErrorHandlersEnabled,
2142                 () -> "Arez-0182: ArezContext.addObserverErrorHandler() invoked when Arez.areObserverErrorHandlersEnabled() returns false." );
2143    }
2144    getObserverErrorHandlerSupport().addObserverErrorHandler( handler );
2145  }
2146
2147  /**
2148   * Remove error handler from list of existing error handlers.
2149   * The handler should already be in the list. This method should NOT be called if
2150   * {@link Arez#areObserverErrorHandlersEnabled()} returns false.
2151   *
2152   * @param handler the error handler.
2153   */
2154  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_observer_error_handlers" )
2155  public void removeObserverErrorHandler( @Nonnull final ObserverErrorHandler handler )
2156  {
2157    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
2158    {
2159      invariant( Arez::areObserverErrorHandlersEnabled,
2160                 () -> "Arez-0181: ArezContext.removeObserverErrorHandler() invoked when Arez.areObserverErrorHandlersEnabled() returns false." );
2161    }
2162    getObserverErrorHandlerSupport().removeObserverErrorHandler( handler );
2163  }
2164
2165  /**
2166   * Report an error in observer.
2167   *
2168   * @param observer  the observer that generated error.
2169   * @param error     the type of the error.
2170   * @param throwable the exception that caused error if any.
2171   */
2172  void reportObserverError( @Nonnull final Observer observer,
2173                            @Nonnull final ObserverError error,
2174                            @Nullable final Throwable throwable )
2175  {
2176    if ( willPropagateSpyEvents() )
2177    {
2178      getSpy().reportSpyEvent( new ObserverErrorEvent( observer.asInfo(), error, throwable ) );
2179    }
2180    if ( Arez.areObserverErrorHandlersEnabled() )
2181    {
2182      getObserverErrorHandlerSupport().onObserverError( observer, error, throwable );
2183    }
2184  }
2185
2186  /**
2187   * Return true if spy events will be propagated.
2188   * This means spies are enabled and there is at least one spy event handler present.
2189   *
2190   * @return true if spy events will be propagated, false otherwise.
2191   */
2192  boolean willPropagateSpyEvents()
2193  {
2194    return Arez.areSpiesEnabled() && getSpy().willPropagateSpyEvents();
2195  }

2200   *

2202   */
2203  @Nonnull
2204  public Spy getSpy()
2205  {
2206    if ( Arez.shouldCheckApiInvariants() )
2207    {
2208      apiInvariant( Arez::areSpiesEnabled, () -> "Arez-0021: Attempting to get Spy but spies are not enabled." );
2209    }
2210    assert null != _spy;
2211    return _spy;
2212  }

2225  @OmitSymbol( unless = "arez.enable_registries" )
2226  void registerObservableValue( @Nonnull final ObservableValue<?> observableValue )
2227  {
2228    final String name = observableValue.getName();
2229    if ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() )
2230    {
2231      invariant( Arez::areRegistriesEnabled,
2232                 () -> "Arez-0022: ArezContext.registerObservableValue invoked when Arez.areRegistriesEnabled() returns false." );
2233      assert null != _observableValues;
2234      invariant( () -> !_observableValues.containsKey( name ),
2235                 () -> "Arez-0023: ArezContext.registerObservableValue invoked with observableValue named '" + name +
2236                       "' but an existing observableValue with that name is already registered." );
2237    }
2238    assert null != _observableValues;
2239    _observableValues.put( name, observableValue );
2240  }
2241

2244  {

2247    {
2248      invariant( Arez::areRegistriesEnabled,
2249                 () -> "Arez-0024: ArezContext.deregisterObservableValue invoked when Arez.areRegistriesEnabled() returns false." );
2250      assert null != _observableValues;
2251      invariant( () -> _observableValues.containsKey( name ),
2252                 () -> "Arez-0025: ArezContext.deregisterObservableValue invoked with observableValue named '" + name +
2253                       "' but no observableValue with that name is registered." );
2254    }
2255    assert null != _observableValues;
2256    _observableValues.remove( name );
2257  }

2428  @Nullable
2429  private String observerToName( @Nonnull final Observer observer )
2430  {
2431    return Arez.areNamesEnabled() ? observer.getName() : null;
2432  }
2433
2434  private int trackerObserveFlags( @Nonnull final Observer observer )
2435  {
2436    return Transaction.Flags.REQUIRE_NEW_TRANSACTION |
2437           ( Arez.shouldCheckInvariants() ?
2438             observer.areArezDependenciesRequired() ?
2439             Observer.Flags.AREZ_DEPENDENCIES :
2440             Observer.Flags.AREZ_OR_NO_DEPENDENCIES :
2441             0 ) |
2442           ( Arez.areSpiesEnabled() && observer.noReportResults() ? Observer.Flags.NO_REPORT_RESULT : 0 ) |
2443           ( Arez.shouldEnforceTransactionType() ?
2444             ( observer.isMutation() ? Observer.Flags.READ_WRITE : Observer.Flags.READ_ONLY ) :
2445             0 );
2446  }
2447
2448  private void reportActionStarted( @Nullable final String name,
2449                                    @Nullable final Object[] parameters,
2450                                    final boolean observed )
2451  {
2452    assert null != name;
2453    final Object[] params = null == parameters ? new Object[ 0 ] : parameters;
2454    getSpy().reportSpyEvent( new ActionStartEvent( name, observed, params ) );
2455  }
2456
2457  private void reportActionCompleted( @Nullable final String name,
2458                                      @Nullable final Object[] parameters,
2459                                      final boolean observed,
2460                                      final Throwable t,
2461                                      final long startedAt,
2462                                      final boolean returnsResult,
2463                                      final Object result )
2464  {
2465    final long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startedAt;
2466    assert null != name;
2467    final Object[] params = null == parameters ? new Object[ 0 ] : parameters;
2468    getSpy().reportSpyEvent( new ActionCompleteEvent( name,
2469                                                      observed,
2470                                                      params,
2471                                                      returnsResult,
2472                                                      result,
2473                                                      t,
2474                                                      (int) duration ) );
2475  }
